definition: to be deeply concerned/to be troubled (by)
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: "The abductee issue is [one] of grave concern, " Clinton said.
sentences.chinese: “绑架问题值得严重关切，”希拉里说。

sentences.english: In addition, there have been concerns over how the council deals with Israel.
sentences.chinese: 此外，有人对人权理事会如何对待以色列表示关切。

sentences.english: So there are communication lines China is concerned about.
sentences.chinese: 因此，中国有自己的交通线需要关切。

sentences.english: Then he should call President Hu Jintao of China and express serious concern.
sentences.chinese: 随后他应该致电中国国家主席胡锦涛表示严重关切。

sentences.english: He also urged the US side to take strong measures and earnestly solve China's concerns.
sentences.chinese: 他还敦促美方采取有力措施，切实解决中方有关关切。

sentences.english: The Giver went to the wall speaker and clicked the switch to ON.
sentences.chinese: 记忆传承者走到墙上的喇叭那里把开关切到开的位置。

sentences.english: Dicky Cheung explained in a low voice, expressed in the words of his beloved wife's concern.
sentences.chinese: 张卫健低声解释道，言语中流露出对爱妻的关切之情。

sentences.english: They voiced concerns about security and the threat of off-campus lifestyles getting out of control.
sentences.chinese: 他们表示关切和对安全的威胁关闭校园生活失控。

sentences.english: The escapees – hidden behind various shelves – look on with concern.
sentences.chinese: 越狱犯一伙藏身在架子后面，关切地注意情况的变化。

sentences.english: I am following with great concern the tragic events of recent days in Nigeria.
sentences.chinese: 对于近日来发生在尼日利亚的惨案，我深表关切。

sentences.english: Apple's biggest concern is whether the factories can deliver on time, and get the quality right.
sentences.chinese: 苹果的最大关切在于厂商是否能按时交货并保证质量。

sentences.english: Consider first the ultimate concern of meaninglessness.
sentences.chinese: 首先看看终极关切中的无意义这个主题。

sentences.english: I speak today out of a concerned and troubled heart.
sentences.chinese: 我今天怀着一颗关切和不安的心演讲。

definition: to be concerned about/to care about
to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
deeply worried and sick at heart (idiom)
